define.name: nof_plls
define.doc: Number of synce plls in the device.

define.name: nif_div_min
define.doc: Min value for the nif synce output clk.

define.name: nif_div_max
define.doc: Max value for the nif synce output clk.

define.name: fabric_div_min
define.doc: Min value for the fabric synce output clk.

define.name: fabric_div_max
define.doc: Max value for the fabric synce output clk.

define.name: nof_clk_blocks
define.doc: Max value for the nif synce clock blocks.

define.name: nof_fabric_clk_blocks
define.doc: Max value for the fabric synce clock blocks.

value.name: source_clock_port
value.doc: Select the SyncE source port for SyncE PLL.

value.name: squelch_enable
value.doc: Enable or Disable the SyncE auto-squelch.

table.name: nmg_chain_map
table.doc: ethu_id mapped to NMG chain related to SYNCE

feature.name: synce_no_sdm_mode
feature.doc: Indicates SYNCE is NOT in SDM mode.

feature.name: synce_nmg_chain_select
feature.doc: NMG_SYNC_CHAIN_SEL is needed or not to be configured to select NMG chain 0 or 1
